T11dhkpvsvu:5: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units,

T11dhkpvsvu:7: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that

T11dhkpvsvu:10: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to words or compound words.
T11dhkpvsvu:11: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided,
T11dhkpvsvu:12: and terms such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
T11dhkpvsvu:13: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta
T11dhkpvsvu:14: fundamentally remain undivided. For example: karyakaranabhava/-bhuta/-ta.
T11dhkpvsvu:15: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya,
T11dhkpvsvu:17: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
T11dhkpvsvu:18: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
T11dhkpvsvu:19: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,

T11dhkpvsvu:24: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of using this database to make an KWIC index.

T11dhkpvsvu:7099: 17524 śabdo niṣparyāyaṃ nityaś ca syād anityaś ca iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:7100: 17525 vastubhir na āgamās tena kathaṃcin nāntarīyakāḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:7102: 17527 āgamaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad-ādarśita-artha-pratipattaye ajño janaḥ samanveṣate
T11dhkpvsvu:7107: 17601 samīhita-artha-sattām antareṇa api vṛttiṃ paśyato bhavitavyam eva
T11dhkpvsvu:7109: 17602 vyabhicāra-vacasām api puruṣāṇāṃ vāci śaṅkayā kiṃ yathārthā
T11dhkpvsvu:7111: tena na yuktam anena kasyacid vacanena kiṃcin
T11dhkpvsvu:7113: 17605 tasmān na tan-nivṛttyā api bhāva-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati /
T11dhkpvsvu:7114: 17606 yad uktaṃ sarva-viṣayatvād āgamasya sati vastuny avisaṃvādena
T11dhkpvsvu:7115: 17607 asya vṛttes tan-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇa-anupalabdhir abhāvaṃ sādhayati 17608 iti tad asya sarva-viṣayatve api vastv-antareṇa āvṛttau syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:7120: 17611 tasmān na pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttāv api viprakṛṣṭeṣv abhāva-niścayaḥ /
